title: RHTP 5.A
prompt: A wide overhead shot of a rural county administrative building's worn wooden desk, scattered with overlapping documents, budget spreadsheets, and organizational charts—some annotated with handwritten notes and arrows pointing in conflicting directions. Morning light streams through a window, casting long shadows across the papers. A coffee mug sits half-empty beside a telephone. The composition should feel cluttered yet purposeful, capturing the texture of bureaucratic work in small-town America—the gap between what the official documents say and the actual complexity of daily implementation visible in the physical disorder of real governance.
